parameters.name: InstanceStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the instance. Valid values:

*   `PENDING`: The instance is being initialized.
*   `INIT_ERROR`: The initialization of the instance fails.
*   `STARTING`: The instance is being started.
*   `RUNNING`: The instance is running.
*   `STOPPING`: The instance is being stopped.
*   `STOPPED`: The instance is stopped.
*   `DELETING`: The instance is being deleted.
*   `DELETED`: The instance is deleted.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs.
